name: pokthello
description: A Pokemon to Shakespeare description translator
author: Davide Gironi

scripts.dockerbuild: cd pokthello-web && npm run dockerbuild && cd .. && cd pokthello-api && docker build -t pokthello .
scripts.herokuship: cd pokthello-web && npm run herokubuild && cd .. && git commit -am 'heroku push' && git push heroku `git subtree split --prefix pokthello-api master`:master --force
